column5: 2015 - the wife of vaughn w heaton - mother of jeri. lu houston
column6: lorilee cannon and craig heaton - sister of margaret ann barton - funeral services will be held on friday
column8: 2015 at 1:00 p. m. in the panguitch stake center - friends may call on thursday
column10: 2015 at the stake center from 6-8:00 p. m. and also prior to services on friday from 11:00-12:30 - burial will be in the panguitch cemetery - funeral directors: magleby mortuary
